attributes.action: STOP criminalising the UK taxpayer population by forcing them to purchase a TV Licence.
attributes.additional_details: It is plainly obvious that people in high places in the BBC have been using the TV Licence Tax to fund the institutionalised abuse of children by BBC television celebrities over the last 50 or so years.  It is immoral that people can be criminalised for using a television receiver without a licence even though they refuse to pay because they know the money will be used to fund paedophile activity, and has been for the last FIVE DECADES.
